reviews.text:
Very nice restaurant with a modern Nordic cuisine. Great flavours and beautiful presentation. I tried 5 courses menu with winepairing. My favourites were mussel soup and waffle with mushrooms, although all 5 dishes were just delicious! Wines - as well!

Worth mentioning their wonderful service! The girls were super nice, presenting every course and every wine, always smiling and creating nice relaxing atmosphere. They were also very flexible and gave me a table when I was quite late to my reservation due to some unforeseen circumstances.

I would definitely come back there and really recommend this place to others due to their delicious food, great service and pleasant atmosphere.

Thank you!

We didn’t have a reservation but were able to enjoy a most delicious four course meal! From the bread, fig salad, mussel soup, quail, monk fish pastry, and strawberry dessert - all the flavors were divine. Service was impeccable!

Incredible dining experience! I ordered the 5-course menu with the 5 accompanying wine glasses for each meal, which is such a great concept.
I also LOVED the interior design and the atmosphere. Service was also very good!

My dad visited this restaurant two years ago, and recommended it to me while now I’m traveling in Copenhagen. Now I totally understand why he loves this place. Chilling atmosphere, lovely staff, and the dishes were creative and tasty. Wonderful place for a fine dining in Copenhagen.

Sublime.. Highly creative food, worth a plane ride, not just a detour.

The mussels soup, the monk fish in puff pastry, the waffle with. Mushrooms, the ribeye... Wow.

Spectacular.

Simplicity in interior design, perfection of service and sublime food.
